price: Abagarariji, barinamuye mu guhakana bivuye inyuma izurwa ry’ibiremwa bati: “Muhama! Mbega ubona iryo sango ryo guhanirwako ku musi w’izuka, rizoshika ryari nimwaba wewe n’abemeramana muri kumwe, muri imvugakuri?”.
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-waʿdu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
